item.description:
Hey Informal Nation,

The Saturday after next, you may notice a festive gathering as you start your run along the Charles. At noon that day, I will be running the iChase the Cure 5K, which raises funds to fight children's brain tumors. Hopefully, I'll meet up with the gang at City Sports and jog over for a warm-up. It's a fun, small, well-organized race for a really good cause, so I'm extending a cordial invite to any TMIRCEers who would like to join me!

http://www.ichasethecure.org/

If you'd like to chip in a few bucks for a donation, well, that's cool too:

http://www.active.com/donate/iCTC/JFalvo1

Thanks!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: iChase the Cure 5K, Saturday, April 14, the Esplanade
